item.title: Assigning data
item.description: import pandas as pddf = pd.read_excel('Car_Pricing.xlsx')df['Review'] = 'Ok'df['Review'] 0 Ok 1 Ok 2 Ok 3 Ok 4 Ok .. 1229 Ok 1230 Ok 1231 Ok 1232 Ok 1233 Ok Name: Review, Length: 1234, dtype: object df['index_backwards'] = range(len(df), 0, -1) df['index_backwards'] 0 1234 1 1233 2 1232 3 1231 4 1230 ... 1229 5 1230 4 1231 3 1232 2 1233 1 Name: index_backwards, Length: 1234, dtype: int64

item.title: Combining
item.description: import pandas as pddf = pd.read_csv('diabetes.csv') df2 = pd.read_csv('heart.csv')pd.concat([df, df2]) .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type { vertical-align: middle; } .dataframe tbody tr th { vertical-align: top; } .dataframe thead th { text-align: right; } Pregnancies Glucose BloodPressure SkinThickness Insulin BMI DiabetesPedigreeFunction Age Outcome age ... chol fbs restecg thalach exang oldpeak slope ca thal target 0 6.0 148.0 72.0 35.0 0.0 33.6 0.627 50.

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: import pandas as pddf = pd.read_excel('Car_Pricing.xlsx')df.Mileage.describe() count 1234 unique 301 top 17.0 kmpl freq 35 Name: Mileage, dtype: object df.Location.describe() count 1234 unique 11 top Mumbai freq 159 Name: Location, dtype: object df.Seats.mean() 5.28454619787408 df.Location.unique() array(['Delhi', 'Coimbatore', 'Mumbai', 'Hyderabad', 'Pune', 'Jaipur', 'Chennai', 'Kochi', 'Bangalore', 'Kolkata', 'Ahmedabad'], dtype=object) df.Name.value_counts() Maruti Alto LXi 9 Maruti Swift Dzire VDI 8 Honda City 1.5 V MT 8 Volkswagen Polo 1.2 MPI Highline 8 Honda Brio S MT 7 .

item.title: Grouping
item.description: import pandas as pddf = pd.read_excel('Car_Pricing.xlsx')df.groupby('Location').Location.count() Location Ahmedabad 51 Bangalore 82 Chennai 97 Coimbatore 136 Delhi 106 Hyderabad 134 Jaipur 86 Kochi 121 Kolkata 119 Mumbai 159 Pune 143 Name: Location, dtype: int64 df.groupby('Fuel_Type').Fuel_Type.count() Fuel_Type CNG 6 Diesel 647 LPG 2 Petrol 579 Name: Fuel_Type, dtype: int64 df.groupby('Transmission').Transmission.count() Transmission Automatic 329 Manual 905 Name: Transmission, dtype: int64 df.groupby('Owner_Type').Owner_Type.count() Owner_Type First 1023 Fourth & Above 3 Second 184 Third 24 Name: Owner_Type, dtype: int64

item.title: Grouping & multi-indexing
item.description: import pandas as pddf = pd.read_excel('Car_Pricing.xlsx')Location_Collected = df.groupby(['Location', 'Name', 'Fuel_Type']).Kilometers_Driven.agg([len]) Location_Collected .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type { vertical-align: middle; } .dataframe tbody tr th { vertical-align: top; } .dataframe thead th { text-align: right; } len Location Name Fuel_Type Ahmedabad Audi A3 35 TDI Attraction Diesel 1 Audi Q3 35 TDI Quattro Premium Plus Diesel 1 Audi Q5 2008-2012 2.

item.title: Grouping and Sorting
item.description: import pandas as pddf = pd.read_excel('Car_Pricing.xlsx')Location_Collected = df.groupby(['Name', 'Fuel_Type']).Kilometers_Driven.agg([len])Location_Collected = Location_Collected.reset_index() Location_Collected = Location_Collected.sort_values(by = 'len') Location_Collected .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type { vertical-align: middle; } .dataframe tbody tr th { vertical-align: top; } .dataframe thead th { text-align: right; } Name Fuel_Type len 0 Audi A3 35 TDI Attraction Diesel 1 450 Maruti Dzire ZDI Diesel 1 451 Maruti Eeco 5 STR With AC Plus HTR CNG CNG 1 453 Maruti Ertiga SHVS VDI Diesel 1 456 Maruti Ertiga VXI Petrol Petrol 1 .

item.title: Grouping by apply()
item.description: import pandas as pddata = pd.read_excel('Car_Pricing.xlsx')data.groupby('Name').apply(lambda df: df.Kilometers_Driven.iloc[0]) Name Audi A3 35 TDI Attraction 84004 Audi A3 35 TDI Premium Plus 52300 Audi A4 2.0 TDI 46000 Audi A4 2.0 TDI 177 Bhp Technology Edition 87001 Audi A4 2.0 TDI Multitronic 55000 ... Volvo S60 D5 Kinetic 70000 Volvo S80 D5 87000 Volvo V40 Cross Country D3 60000 Volvo XC60 D4 SUMMUM 64000 Volvo XC90 2007-2015 D5 AWD 70000 Length: 768, dtype: int64 data.

item.title: Manipulating the index
item.description: import pandas as pddf = pd.read_excel('Car_Pricing.xlsx')df.set_index("Mileage") .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type { vertical-align: middle; } .dataframe tbody tr th { vertical-align: top; } .dataframe thead th { text-align: right; } Name Location Year Kilometers_Driven Fuel_Type Transmission Owner_Type Engine Power Seats Mileage 32.26 km/kg Maruti Alto K10 LXI CNG Delhi 2014 40929 CNG Manual First 998 CC 58.

item.title: Maps
item.description: import pandas as pddf = pd.read_excel('Car_Pricing.xlsx')df_Km_mean = df.Kilometers_Driven.mean() df.Kilometers_Driven.map(lambda p: p - df_Km_mean) 0 -17578.288493 1 -4014.288493 2 -24507.288493 3 80492.711507 4 -29507.288493 ... 1229 30903.711507 1230 492.711507 1231 -30507.288493 1232 -6245.288493 1233 13935.711507 Name: Kilometers_Driven, Length: 1234, dtype: float64 def dfmean_km(row): row.Kilometers_Driven = row.Kilometers_Driven - df_Km_mean return row df.apply(dfmean_km, axis = 'columns') .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type { vertical-align: middle; } .dataframe tbody tr th { vertical-align: top; } .

item.title: Missing Data
item.description: import pandas as pddf = pd.read_excel('Car_Pricing.xlsx')df[pd.isnull(df.Year)] .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type { vertical-align: middle; } .dataframe tbody tr th { vertical-align: top; } .dataframe thead th { text-align: right; } Name Location Year Kilometers_Driven Fuel_Type Transmission Owner_Type Mileage Engine Power Seats df.Seats.fillna("Unknown") 0 4 1 5 2 7 3 5 4 5 .. 1229 5 1230 5 1231 5 1232 5 1233 5 Name: Seats, Length: 1234, dtype: object df.

item.title: Renaming
item.description: import pandas as pddf = pd.read_excel('Car_Pricing.xlsx')df.rename(columns = {'Seats':'Capacity'}) .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type { vertical-align: middle; } .dataframe tbody tr th { vertical-align: top; } .dataframe thead th { text-align: right; } Name Location Year Kilometers_Driven Fuel_Type Transmission Owner_Type Mileage Engine Power Capacity 0 Maruti Alto K10 LXI CNG Delhi 2014 40929 CNG Manual First 32.26 km/kg 998 CC 58.2 bhp 4.0 1 Maruti Alto 800 2016-2019 LXI Coimbatore 2013 54493 Petrol Manual Second 24.
